text: obe daru gabe palamu chalanaya ithama ihala sathutak gena ena awasthawaki.

thamama gasbadaganna samrurdhila inna rataka, bima perali perali gasaganna aarakshaka niladharin sitina rataka, janathawa idiriye wedi thaba pala yana rataka,....
mema drushtikonayen gathwita, podu thema pataya lenin wisin, aduwadi washayen, pahatha dakwena lesa suthragatha kaleya : ‘apa athulwemin sitinne jayagrahi nirdhana panthi wiplawayange yugayatayi’.

riya anathurak bawata nila washayen sandahan kara thibunu, wasim thajudinge maranaya, ghathanayak bawata thorathuru soyagath rahas polisiye niladharinta me kumantha්ranaya gana thorathuru helidaraw karaganima amaru deyak nowe.
adhipathiya shokayen kalakirenne ya.
pirimi apata balaporoththu bindila giyama hitha aapahu yam tharamakata hari hadaganna kam eka eka dewal wala pihita pathanna wenawa.
me athara dushithayanta horunta danduwam karana bawata karana ghoshawa mathiwarana karaliye mahath peraliyak athikara thibe.
obata kamathi deyak kamathi widihata danna puluwan .
- mana magulakda wenne?
sirisena hithuwe thamage ama shri lanipaya gilla kiyaya.

‘‘rediyo dambaana’’ wadi bhashawa watina bhashawak bawata pathkaralimata hethu wu bawa pawasana wadi nayakathuma anekuth guwanwiduli nalika athara dambaana guwanwiduliya yahapath mattamaka thibena bawath me guwanwiduliya thibimen palak nowana bawa kisiwekutath pawasiya nohaki bawa sandahan karayi.
ara mathiwaranaya sambandha saukhya regulasi gasat pathrayehi prasiddha karana thek mathiwarana komisame sabhapathita ispasuwak thibune naha
prathamika panthiwaladida mata spanynyaya ha pruthugalaya gana yam danumak thibini.
rata thota gana mukuth nodana me steshame me wedikawenma kochchiyen eliyata palaweni adiya thiyapu mama ada thaniyama me hama thanakama yanna tharam shakthimath wela.
1974 - 1977 kalaye giya thawath wadasatahanak thamayi "jathika satanata ekweyi rata thota" kiyana eka.
